section.title: New in this Release
section.para: This section lists the new features and enhancements introduced since Open Object Rexx 4.1.2. However, Open Object Rexx 4.1.3 is a bug fix only release and there are no new features or enhancements. This section of the document is left as a template for future releases.

You should refer to the CHANGES document accompanying the release for a complete list of the bug fixes. In addition, there is a ReleaseNotes document that contains essentially the same information as this section, but in a text format. These documents are accessible from the SourceForge download page for each ooRexx release. They are also included in the source code for ooRexx when SourceForge is not used.

section.title: All Platforms
section.para: This is a bug fix only release. Bug fixes are listed in the CHANGES document.

section.title: ooDialog
section.para: The version of ooDialog distributed in ooRexx 4.1.3 is the latest official release of ooDialog at the time of the ooRexx.4.1.3 release.
ooDialog release versions have been decoupled from the ooRexx distribution. Independent installation packages for ooDialog are available from SourceForge at: ooDialog
All current ooDialog installation packages, ooDialog 4.0.0 through ooDialog 4.2.2, will install over ooRexx 4.1.3.
If the ooRexx user is unhappy with ooDialog 4.2.2 for any reason, that user can replace ooDialog 4.2.2 with one of the other versions of ooDialog on SourceForge from the URL listed above.
